sentences.english: Good afternoon, this is Gianluca speaking, how can I help you?

sentences.english: Mr. Cheng greets our audience for the Chinese New Year and talks about the local Chinese garment industry.

sentences.english: Mr. Ganis said that no changes had been made to other Oscar categories.

sentences.english: The fruit is rather like a sweet chestnut.

sentences.english: And, strangely enough, old Archibald admired and trusted him.

sentences.english: Doctor Gan is its striking representative.
Our notation was adapted from that of Professor Kane of Stanford University.

sentences.english: Consequently, the relationship of Ganesha and his mother is unique and special.

sentences.english: Gan woodenly awoke sitting up in front of the bench, and then suddenly started running.
